name: Egg Bomb - Spawn Torpedo Shell
description:
“Interesting Sound Effects”
“Great Time Killer”
“Easy to Understand”

As the name suggests - Egg Bomb, you are going to use eggs as the bombs to destroy the blocks (Wooden and stone) on the ground. You have the unlimited supply of the eggs. You just have to get rid of the blocks as soon as you can. The background gives a very rustic and earthy feel. The brown and green colors of the elements add a rural touch to it. So, if you love country side locations, chickens, birds, eggs, farm houses, this game is for you.

The sound effects in the game are great. Kill time in fun and exciting way with Egg Bomb. As you reach new levels, the game gets more interesting. You have to aim at specific objects only. If you drop an egg on the wrong item, you get a negative score.

+++GAME FEATURES+++
Rusty Looks
Unlimited Eggs to Drop
Exciting Levels
